Package org.knime.core.webui.data.rpc.json.impl

Class JsonRpcServer

java.lang.Object
org.knime.core.webui.data.rpc.json.impl.JsonRpcServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
RpcServer
public class JsonRpcServer extends Object implements RpcServer
A wrapper for the JsonRpcMultiServer; a simple delegate in case we want to exchange the JSON-RPC implementation. The service interface and their handler registered with this server need to either follow a certain convention or a custom ObjectMapper (for de-/serialization) needs to be provided. For more details see JsonRpcSingleClient.
Since:
4.3
Author:
Martin Horn, KNIME GmbH, Konstanz, Germany, Carl Witt, KNIME AG, Zurich, Switzerland

  • Method Details

    • addService

      public <S> void addService(Class<S> serviceInterface, S handler)
      Adds a new service handler to the server. The simple class name of the service interface is used as service name. The service name is used in the JSON-RPC request method property to specify the service to use (e.g. MyService.theMethodToCall)
      Type Parameters:
      S - the type of the handler
      Parameters:
      serviceInterface - the interface implemented by the handler (i.e. node data service)
      handler - the handler implementation

    • addService

      public <S> void addService(String serviceName, S handler)
      Adds a new service handler to the server.
      Type Parameters:
      S - the type of the handler
      Parameters:
      serviceName - the unique name for the service (the name must be stated in the method field of the JSON-RPC request, e.g., "method": "ServiceName.someMethod")
      handler - the handler implementation

    • handleRequest

      public void handleRequest(InputStream in, OutputStream out) throws IOException
      Handles a single request from the given InputStream, that is, a single JsonNode is read from the stream and treated as a JSON-RPC request. All responses are written to the given OutputStream. The method to call needs to include the simple name of the service interface, see addService(Class, Object).
      Specified by:
      handleRequest in interface RpcServer
      Parameters:
      in - contains the request
      out - receives the response
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getHandler

      public <S> S getHandler(String serviceName)
      Description copied from interface: RpcServer
      See RpcServer.getHandler(Class).
      Specified by:
      getHandler in interface RpcServer
      Type Parameters:
      S - the node data service interface (i.e., the methods offered by the node model to the node dialog/view to retrieve data)
      Parameters:
      serviceName - the name of the interface that identifies the implementation of the node data service interface to return
      Returns:
      a service implementation
